headline: 1 Magnificent Stock You'll Regret Not Buying in the Nasdaq Correction
summary: The recent dip that especially affected the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite is no different.  The past five years have been a roller coaster for PayPal and its shareholders.  The company turned in some of the best quarters in its history in the early days of the pandemic as retail activity shifted in ways that helped its business.
